Title: Modelling the epidemic trend of the 2019 novel coronavirus outbreak in China - Contribution 1
Basic reproduction number: Basic reproduction number estimate value specification
Method: Mathematical model, dynamic compartmental model with population divided into five compartments: susceptible individuals, asymptomatic individuals during the incubation period, infectious individuals with symptoms, isolated individuals with treatment and recovered individuals

Title: Novel coronavirus 2019-nCoV: early estimation of epidemiological parameters and epidemic predictions - Contribution 1
